body:
Using a Freezie as a dildo sounds like a good way to get frost burn on your vaginal walls. 

Seriously though, don't use ice rods to masturbate. It can cause damage to your mucous membranes and may lead to infections or permanent scarring.
Sissy has to be the weirdest translation for "onee-sama" I've ever come across.
They have misaka some nice tits
Jesus, Biribiri is savage. She broke Kuroko back on that cover.
